"Exchanges in the Exchange Shop":
"There are two ways you can exchange for items in the exchange shop: By selecting the item you want, and by selecting the items you want to trade away.

If both methods are available, you can use <%Function> to switch between them."

"When selecting the items you want to trade away, the following restrictions apply:

・The items you will be receiving must be pre-determined.
・The item you will be receiving cannot include weapons or armor."
